程序包 game

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    Board
    Class Board Chessboard, storage and management of chess, chess logic, game logic, recording, and so on.
    Piece
    Class Piece represents the chessmen in all games, and stores the basic properties of each chessman, including the color, type, location, picture and some auxiliary functions of chessmen.
    Position
    Class Position used to represent the position of the board on the board
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明
    Piece.Color
    Enum Color used to represent two kinds of chessmen in black and white
    Piece.Type
    Enum Type used to represent different kinds of chessmen
